title: Let's Not Fall In Love
author: Ribonette
synopsis: [AU] Daidouji Tomoyo had never take any of her boyfriends seriously, and didn't care at all when her relationships came to an end; actually, she preferred it that way. That, until she met him: Kinomoto Touya. The rule was simple: Let's don't fall in love. Would she be able to follow it?

title: Cards, love, war, and rebellion
author: TheDemigodIsSpying
synopsis: A fantasy AU story, Sakura and Syaorang go on a journey in the world of magica to end a war against the demons in the empire of Han-cho, a dangerous journey of adventure, magic, and love. one that will get them to save the world from total enslavement.

title: Sakura the Vampire Slayer
author: Sakura the Vampire Slayer
synopsis: A human-created virus has spread across the planet, turning part of the population into vampires. Sakura and her friends live in a shelter in the year 2500. They go out in search of adventure and vampires to kill... but they are in for surprises, especially an amber-eyed vampire who will follow her trail until he finds her. Warning: sex content and violence

title: My Best Friend, Syaoran
author: BlueZeldana
synopsis: Sakura and Syaoran are new students in the same high school. The first day they connect with each other, becoming really good friends. But, some years later, Syaoran starts to feel something different for her... He has no idea why, but he has fallen in love with her. Will their friendship survive? Will Sakura love him back? / Slow burn. Warning: sex content.

title: Love Me Back
author: animechick132
synopsis: REVISION. What happens when Sakura gets partnered with the bad boy to take care of a baby for a class she needs to graduate? Not to mention, they have bad history. Neither thought a project would bring them back together after a betrayal that tore them apart. How did they find themselves visiting the past they tried to forget and move on from? A hell of a lot happens in 2 weeks!

title: Delinquent 7
author: Delinquent 7
synopsis: Some believe they're Godly, others believe they are mere delinquents. When Sakura is admitted to facility for the Divine – beings with violent and inhuman abilities – she bonds with a tortured Syaoran and the most evolved threats to humanity. As Clow's prophecy of a great calamity approaches, they must decide; are they subjects of a horrid mythology, or an evolution to be corrected

title: My Steps to You
author: My Steps to You
synopsis: Sakura wanted something new in her life. She met a person name Little wolf online. Little does she know he is put in a situation and needs to find a girlfriend to get the clan off his back. They talk over time and eventually meet. But they do not know they are each other until many years later. They meet again in a office and have to work together.

title: Fool For You: Union
author: Fool For You: Union
synopsis: A Fool For You special (to be read after A Fool For You fanfic) A mistress seldom gets a happy ending and a cheater is rarely given a second chance at love. But Sakura and Syaoran are determined to make it work. This is their wedding story.

title: -My1-
author: fluffies4ever
synopsis: Tomoyo writes in her diary about graduating. She has a surprise in store but doesn't know it yet. What'll happen? Please Read To Find Out! P.s I DON'T own anything but my ideas! If you like what you read, feel free...

title: Doctor Satyromaniac
author: animechick132
synopsis: "D-Dr. Li, this is extremely inappropriate for our current situation," she stuttered as Syaoran nibbled gently on her ear. "This will be the last time I do this, and I'll stop, remember?" He kissed her in a spot that he knew every woman loved, and from the way she responded, he knew that he had her right where he wanted her. He just didn't know how wrong his declaration was...

title: Fool For You
author: Fool For You
synopsis: A regular small town girl in Tokyo, Kinomoto Sakura accepts a job she never thought she would have. When she meets Li Syaoran, a rude, insensitive client she never expected to like him. Yet she falls for the man and just when she thought her happily ever after was written in stone, she discovers the one thing that could ruin that - she's the other woman.

title: Cardcaptor Tempura
author: Cardcaptor Tempura
synopsis: Cardcaptor Tempura Dinner-Photo is going to university, but trouble arises. With her friends Gay-Lin, Sharon Linette, and Swamp Tomoyo, will she solve the mysteries that she faces? Will she find out what the Nao-Cards are? Will Yukito ever be seen again? Why is Miss Miso-Queen back at Tomoeda?

title: Sakura and Her Mate
author: Sakura and Her Mate
synopsis: Sakura is a werewolf, future Alpha of her pack. During a trip with her best friend, she finds a trace of a scent... her mate's scent. The poor boy who has that smell has no idea of what is awaiting him. Warning: sex content.

title: A one day three way
author: TLG03
synopsis: Sakura Akiho get naughty together one their last day of high school. What will happen when Li shows up? WARNING-SEXUAL CONTENT.

title: Sakura Madison and Li have a three-way
author: Sakura Madison and Li have a three-way
synopsis: Sakura Li and Madison are in their freshmen year of college and they want to try something new. WARNING-SEXUAL CONTENT.

title: The magic kingdom
author: TLG03
synopsis: Sakura and Madison take a trip to Disneyland California and they spend the night in the penthouse. WARNING-SEXUAL CONTENT.

title: Radio Star
author: boreum dal
synopsis: Wannabe journalist Sakura Kinomoto finds herself reluctantly becoming a fledgling paparazzo and somehow befriending Japan's biggest rock star, Syaoran Li-who happens to be nursing a broken heart. Goodbye, journalistic integrity and hello, media hell.

title: One life
author: Nessa Yavetil
synopsis: When you are a powerful mage who reincarnates after every death, you learn to come to terms with love and loss. You learn to enjoy things while they last. But, what happens when you fall for someone who makes you believe you could change your destiny? (Sequel to "Do you remember love?" READ THAT ONE FIRST!)

title: Bad Boys Dont Fall In Love
author: DarkAngel0795
synopsis: She was a nobody and He was a bad boy heartbreaker. Their paths cross one day and are unable to ignore each other anymore. Your Typical High School Story but definitely a good one. SxS ExT- RATED R FOR SUGGESTIVE THEMES AND SOME FOUL LANGUAGE- NO LEMONS* COMPLETED*

title: Can Love Last
author: Rogue Pixie
synopsis: Hey I'm back rewriting story. I still suck at the summaries so just read the story. So this is after the cards are captured but I'm making them in high school for the adult situation & possible rape I may put them in. (So they are between 16 and 18 in the flashbacks and 21 to 23 in the present) Pairing S&S E&T, Z&C R&OC N&OC, M&OC. Other pairings. Sorry there will be Akiho bashing.

title: Everything Forbidden In the Law
author: animechick132
synopsis: A 17-year-old girl is on the brink of becoming homeless until an amber-eyed child changes her destiny. Just when life takes a turn for the better, she starts to fall for the man who took her in, who happens to be one of the most influential men in Asia. Things can't get any worse, right? She finds out that he's her new teacher! How did she find herself warped in a forbidden affair?

title: Difficult, Dauntless Darling
author: Difficult, Dauntless Darling
synopsis: Soccer Captain Li Syaoran graduates this year. As heir of the Li Clan, he's asked to return to Hong Kong to assume his role. However, there's someone he can't leave behind. Conceited and ill-tempered, she can't decide if she wants to punch him in the face... or have his babies. / RATED M starts at CHAPTER 11!

title: A Brother's Woes
author: magsworld
synopsis: Touya deals with Sakura's constant disappearances and his best friend's dual identity. A Clear Card story told from Touya's point of view. [Relationships: Touya & Yukito, Sakura & Syaoran]

title: At The Beginning
author: MadamKabooshkwa
synopsis: Being the owner of one of Japan's largest jewellery companies isn't easy. Being an artist in a family that is entirely against your profession also isn't easy. Adding all of that on top of being parents? Oof.

title: Until the End
author: amelancholicangel
synopsis: They have known each other since they were young. They are best of friends and he belongs to someone. She on the other hand, loves another. They are best of friends, until the end

title: Queen of Hearts
author: Queen of Hearts
synopsis: As Darkness steadily continues to invade the Realm of Light and her people losing more hope each day, the Queen finds herself running out of options. Her people are dying, the Chosen One has ignored her calls, and her daughter continues to suffer- Just how can she save her realm in what little time they have left?

title: Sakura Sushi
author: Sakura Sushi
synopsis: Syaoran and Sakura wind up on an accidental nine-month journey to parenthood and possibly love.

title: To find purpose
author: To find purpose
synopsis: Continuation of "Why am I here?". Yue centered, 1st person. Contains Yaoi (will be explicit in chapter three). Pairing: Toya x Yukito, Toya X Yue. I'd suggest reading "Why am i here?" first, but it isn't necessarily a requirement to understand this one.

title: Children of Leaders
author: TheCatsMeow16
synopsis: COMPLETE: It's the year 2048, and the world is very different. Four youths struggle between following in the footsteps of their parents, or facing the consequences. When Kinomoto Sakura, the daughter of a disgraced journalist, enters into a risky affair with a soldier, she must decide between playing her part in Utopia, or aiding to overturn a corrupt government.

title: A Place Called The Forbidden City
author: The Hand of Destiny
synopsis: Sakura's taken to be the Imperial Great Son of China, Li Xiao Lang's concubine. Can she survive the intrigue, jealousy and dangers of life in the Forbidden City as she tries to please the prince while falling for another, all with an impending war? SxS

title: Boss's Catch-22
author: Kaijuju
synopsis: When the man she's been married to had altered two facts about himself: 1) He's an influential boss in HK, and 2) He's not really a businessman of some sort.

title: A Cherry blossom's revenge
author: misspokey101
synopsis: Sakura is the leader of a gang that has to merge with with Syaoran's gang in Hong Kong in order to get revenge on her mothers killer..., being edited and changed right now. so things can change easily. please re read when finished.

title: Ever After
author: I-am-pongpagong
synopsis: Li Syaoran met a mysterious beautiful girl in the middle of summer 2012. After a whirlwind romance, she suddenly disappeared from his life. Even with his money & power, he couldn't find anything else about her. A/N: A romantic story where a delicate yet badass Sakura's got a cold and overbearing Syaoran wrapped around her lil' finger. [No third parties! Yea!]

title: The Ski-Resort
author: Captain Imagination
synopsis: I guess sometimes there are a few... Hiccups in life. Sakura and Eriol... With a side order of Syaoran! Enjoy! ;) [Edited 02/08/2015]

title: Sakura's Slave - On Hold -
author: Sakura's Slave - On Hold -
synopsis: Requested Fic: Sakura wants a slave and it's the M/r! What will happen when Sakura finally has who she wants? Warning: Futa!Sakura and smut

title: Captive Bride
author: MadamKabooshkwa
synopsis: Due to her recent attempt at escaping her prison, Sakura is informed that she will be assigned a personal guard. Only, it's under the guise that they're there to protect her. Adding that to the news that her guard is the heir to the throne, Sakura realises that something is very amiss. What will she do when she finds out the truth?

title: In Hot Water
author: Naozumi Izumi Chou
synopsis: A selection of stories focused around the men of Cardcaptor Sakura after the magical story has concluded. Yukito Tsukishiro, Touya Kinomoto, Syaoran Li, and Fujitaka Kinomoto are featured separately and in different combinations to highlight their changing relationships.. I'm not an experienced author, and I'd love feedback! Chapter 2 is coming up shortly!

title: Showing Her Love
author: SweetChiari
synopsis: Madison wants to show Sakura that she loves her, but how will she do that? And, will her plan work? English dub names are used! TW/CW: Rape/Non-con under the influence of drugs

title: Li's Goodbye Gift
author: SweetChiari
synopsis: Sakura intends on giving Showron something before he leaves. She also asks Madison to help her with her plan. What could be Sakura's plan and will it be successful for her? This was a collaboration with a friend, so please enjoy it! English dub names are used!

title: Prophecy
author: MadamKabooshkwa
synopsis: War has plagued the Night World for centuries now, and hope of survival is dying quickly. Their only hope lies in the old prophecy about a young man who will lead them to victory. Between avoiding being murdered, betrayal and forced into a world he knows nothing about, how does Syaoran hope to survive?

title: With Words
author: Mara Moon
synopsis: Love can create a relationship without much need for conversations, but assumptions can grow in the absence of words, and assumptions can lead to painful misunderstandings. When Sakura and Syaoran finally move in together, having been accustomed to a long distance relationship with little to expect, relying only on past promises might not be enough.

title: Full Moon
author: Full Moon
synopsis: Touya was very aware of his feelings for Yukito. So he didn't understand why Yue was always in his thoughts

title: Unwilling
author: MadamKabooshkwa
synopsis: In a society ruled by men, women were supposed to be obedient. They were supposed to be pretty. They were dolls to be controlled. However, Sakura often took those rules and shattered them to pieces, which Syaoran soon discovers once they're married and she refuses to be controlled.

title: Red Light District
author: AnyaVeritas
synopsis: A murderer on the loose inside the districts of Tokyo, innocent people where killed with their bodies naked and scrambled on the floor on the crime scene. When the murderer kills an influential business man in the Red Light District, Detective Li Syaoran is in charge to find the killer, helped by a stripper named Kinomoto Sakura and it seems she knew one of the victims...

title: Getting Up for Love Again
author: StellaRose94
synopsis: Sakura lived a life of serving others and consistently not making her feelings known, now divorcing with a 4 year old she needs to restart of life. Syaoran, a man of business, gives her a job. Love blossoms during morning updates, business meeting, and late nights, and a new life can be created, as long as you get back up again.

title: Flower of China
author: Kath Klein
synopsis: Translated by Yoruki Hiiragizawa. In medieval China, women were treated as objects by the men. Their sole purpose in life, either provide children for their husbands OR pleasure for those who could pay. When kindhearted Sakura defies conventions, her Fate forges her into a brave soldier, proving to an arrogant military man that women aren't exactly the weaker sex. AU.

title: Complicated
author: EntendezVotreCoeur
synopsis: Dating is hard when the guy of your dreams is already going out with one of your friends. It's even harder when his family politics come into play!

title: If You Fall, I Fall
author: If You Fall, I Fall
synopsis: Kinomoto Sakura has been in pain for the last five years of her life, and she is ready to end it all. How could a stranger change her mind about life in one day? Warning: Lemons!

title: The Betrayal
author: MadamKabooshkwa
synopsis: Killing was all she knew, but she didn't know what else to do. So when she's offered a job to be both secretary and to date a covert business owner, she seizes the chance to find a way out of the world of hell she was in.

title: Our Secret Rendezvous
author: Our Secret Rendezvous
synopsis: Behind everybody's back, Eriol has been secretly dating Tomoyo virtually over the long distance of England and Japan. Now that they are finally together again, they resolved to keep their relationships private. This story is compilation about their secret rendezvous. I promise I will write this story until they revealed their relationship. Enjoy!

title: Expiry Date
author: doki-dokiboo
synopsis: Her place was not for rent and neither were their hearts yet they both decided to love each other for a year. It's not lying if she knows, even if she doesn't know it all... Mama always said: "Beware of wolfoolish men, creepy neighbours and bad friends. Good things come and go but bad always stays." SXS -AU-

title: Shadow of the Dragon
author: Lord Archive
synopsis: Sakura faces deadly attacks from an unknown source, with Syaoran and Meiling returning to lend her a hand. Despite the battles, the greatest threat to love may be themselves. Continuation of CCS anime.

title: Amber Eyes
author: CiaraUotani
synopsis: Legend of the wolf was known throughout the small village where she grew up, but to most, it was an old wives tale. But legends always have underlying truth to them. "Beware the wolf on the prowl at night, for he will devour you on sight. They say you can hear his howling cries... Beware... Beware the Amber Eyes."

title: Literary
author: colourwhirled
synopsis: [SxS] Sakura is a famous fanfiction author. Syaoran is the best beta she's ever had. They share a world made of the words and tales they weave and write. Too bad they hate each other in real life... Full summary inside.

title: The Black Wolves
author: CrystalRose2711
synopsis: Sakura's dad engaged her to his boss's son just to have the second highest position at his company. After knowing that,her life just got in hell until the day she got herself into a gang war and being caught up. What will happen to her? It's been decide.

title: I Will Definitely Be Alright When I'm In Your Arms
author: I Will Definitely Be Alright When I'm In Your Arms
synopsis: Syaoran left Sakura when she was 11. Five years later, Syaoran comes back to Tomoeda and attends the same high school as his beloved cherry blossom.But what happens when he can't express his love publicly? How long will he be able to survive with the whole male population hoarding over Sakura? What happens when his family gets involved with his love life? Read this and you'll know.

title: To Be With You
author: To Be With You
synopsis: A historical-romance.In order to have their Moon Stone Jewel back, Tomoyo agreed to be engaged with Eriol because he promised he'll help her. But that's not the only reason why she'll marry him. She's teaching the handsome cold hearted Eriol to love again

title: Meaning of Life
author: Suzume Yoshida
synopsis: Syaoran Li, a famous assassin known throughout in the illegal services, was paid to kill an innocent girl, Sakura Kinomoto. But is she really as innocent as she seems? What happens when Syaoran develops feelings for her that an assassin shouldn't for his target?

title: Devil Can Cry
author: Ashlee274
synopsis: A bounty hunter finds a demon on her door step with a job. What does the Prince of Hell want with her? And what kind of mess did she get herself in?

title: Bad Boys
author: okabe-angel
synopsis: "W-what is this place?" She started to break in tears. "...It's a hell for a girl like you." It was their first encounter, and it wasn't love at first sight. Li Syaoran is a cold-hearted gangster with a tragic past who thought that love is a weakness, until he meets an innocent young girl who is trapped into his life. Will she be able to bring out the best in him?

title: Seductive Segue
author: Seductive Segue
synopsis: Seducing your way into getting what you want with your lover is always the best plan. Well, for Sakura, that is.

title: Restraint
author: pnaixrose
synopsis: Sitting at the edge of his recently disarrayed bed, he buried his face into his hands, his amber eyes wide with disbelief. If only he hadn’t given in to his emotions. If only he hadn’t faltered in that one moment in his restraint. "What have I done?” S&S

title: Tattooed Family
author: Lifes Dark Angel
synopsis: Sakura runs away from her step-mom in Beijing to live with her cousin in Tokyo. There she meets some interesting people who throw her into a world of terror, love and fun! Will she find the one thing she's always needed? Rewritten and Fabulous! Ch. 26 up!

title: Rekindle
author: storyteller87
synopsis: Sakura Kinomoto is in love with Syaoran Li but he had to return to Hong Kong. When she decides to go to Hong Kong will she find him the same person after 5 years? rework of my previous story called "initative"

title: The Assassins Daughter
author: The Assassins Daughter
synopsis: *COMPLETE* Strange events leads to Rae's departure from the only family she's ever known, now she is in danger. Her story tells the tale of two generations of killers, the only one who can protect her now is Syaoran, her father, and the most dangerous of all. Now she must piece together her parents troubled past to understand who she really is to determine her on fate.

title: Metamorphosis: The Essence of Magic
author: Latica
synopsis: 10 years after she became the Card Mistress, Sakura has fallen out of love with magic. Expecting the quiet life of a graduate student in Tokyo, Sakura is thrown back into the world of magic when a new enemy appears and threatens to hurt those she holds dear. No longer innocent and naive, 22 year old Sakura must rediscover the essence of magic in order to defeat the darkness.

title: The heartless prince steal's the emerald maiden's heart
author: queensakura14
synopsis: Based on Eyes Of The World and The Forbidden City Samurai has always been Isolated because of her emerald eye's, even so she has always had her kind smile and her family but one day her brother and father fail to return the town. Now Sakura is captured and to be the bride of Imperial son of the Kingdom of Secrets.

title: Do you remember love?
author: Do you remember love?
synopsis: Is it possible to live without love? For some time, she thought she could do it; she thought she could be the perfect smiling doll forever. But the world she had so carefully built one night started to collapse between her hands, and that's when he appeared, to pick up the pieces. This is a little story about the side effects of a happy ending. ExT. For mature readers only.

title: Together Forever
author: NewGaaki
synopsis: Syaoran left Tomoeda after confessing to Sakura. She hasn't given him an answer. It has been 6 years and now he is coming back to Tomoeda. But will the life of the card captors be smooth? What new challenges awaits them? Also, the blooming relationship of our SXS. Had the idea for this about 8 years ago. Now only making it into a novel. Past events are based on both anime and manga

title: Twisted Temptations
author: MistyxRose
synopsis: Tomoyo is the first woman to change playboy Li Syaoran into her faithful fiancé. But just a month before their wedding, she hires her best friend to test his faithfulness. Now the real question is: Can Li Syaoran tame the seductress within Kinomoto Sakura? SxS, ExT. REVISED.

title: Welcome to Reality
author: youkaiworship
synopsis: Sakura's life was normal, boring, and repetitive. One day she witnesses a murder. Her entire world changes as she is suddenly thrust into a world where somebody wants her dead... SxS Violence, Future Lemon, Coarse Language.

title: CardCaptor Sakura: The Transformation
author: CardCaptor Sakura: The Transformation
synopsis: AU. Part 1 Of 5 Of The Darkness Rising Saga. Full Summary Inside. Read And Review. Chapter 4 Is Up!

title: rude X tender
author: rude X tender
synopsis: AU. He's quite the independent guy. Intelligent, alone and rude. I guess her warmth clashed with his shield.

title: Genesis of Evil
author: blacktea
synopsis: Syaoran just got a new security guard job at Anti-Viral Solutions International. Sakura's dad works there as a scientist. She convinces him to ditch his post to hang out with her. After all, surely everything would be alright. AU fusion with Resident Evil.

title: Dark Ice
author: personaltaste92
synopsis: In a world where elements play a huge role, her country was at war. He is a powerful ally, who's attention was unwittingly caught by the Ice princess.

title: My Angel's Wings
author: Sapphira-hime
synopsis: "…make this girl's life miserable, and I will grant you a second chance to live."

title: Winning his heart
author: Shippers1412
synopsis: She always stood by his side, even if his heart still yearning for that woman, who left him to be with someone else. She felt his pain, sadness, and longing for the person you love to love you back. She tried but it never works, yet she never gave up and her wish come true when that woman came and gave a hard mission for her. A mission to change the past by winning his heart!

title: Collection short story of EriTomo
author: Shippers1412
synopsis: Warning! This is just a short story so there will be a high chance that some will leave you unsatisfied ( ) and The main couple of this story is, of course, Tomoyo x Eriol ( )

title: Demons For My Roomate
author: BlueSnowDrop
synopsis: I saw her staring at me with those wide emerald eyes. Her pupil did not move. She did not blink. She has no expression. She has no fear. I leaned close to her until our eyes are only an inch apart and asked her, "Are you blind?"

title: My Secret Boyfriend
author: BlueSnowDrop
synopsis: 'I'll be your secret boyfriend' 'My what' 'Your lovely and dreamy boy' BAM! He had it all, the looks, the body, and of course his weird side of humor. But there was one problem with him, he was a spirit that only she could only see!

title: Youself
author: Youself
synopsis: After the incident that happens a week ago, Tomoyo lost her voice. How will Eriol deal with it?

title: Dear Mom
author: Wawa101
synopsis: On Mother's Day, Sakura writes a letter to her Mom. Very short one-shot. Mention of E/S, but no actual appearance.

title: Patience
author: Doctor Mayfair
synopsis: The High School AU no one asked. Sakura's High School years were going to be perfect… Until her old nemesis transferred to her school, her class, and the desk right behind her. Despite their turbulent past, Sakura is willing to start their relationship over, but what is on Syaoran Li's

title: Time
author: Angel Nat-Chan
synopsis: Sakura thanks Li...

title: To Be With You
author: To Be With You
synopsis: Sakura & Eriol are happy together. But sometimes, to love someone is to let them go. EriolxSakura, rated T for language and theme. COMPLETE

title: Words Don't Come Easy
author: Naminae
synopsis: Sakura Kinomoto is an average 24-year old girl, trying to find where she belongs in the world. After moving to Tokyo for her new job, she meets a man who grants her a generous act of kindness. She suddenly finds herself having to pay-it-forward to another stranger. [AU]

title: Little Wolf
author: BlueSnowDrop
synopsis: Touya got a nice MP3 player and I got a perverted wolf for my Christmas present. It's not a normal wolf I'll warn you. One Christmas Eve the wolf climb over to my bed and the next morning I saw an amber eyes guy lying with me!

title: Fugitive Guardian Beast Seeks Experienced Cardcaptor
author: Fugitive Guardian Beast Seeks Experienced Cardcaptor
synopsis: HELP WANTED: Fugitive guardian beast seeking the Master of the Clow Cards to settle a centuries-old feud and meld two opposing magic systems into one. Magical powers and sealing wand required, detailed knowledge of Clow Reed's past preferred. Card-capturing experience a must. Inquire within. [Post manga; non-Clear Card continuity]

title: Birthday Boy
author: Wawa101
synopsis: Eriol and Sakura celebrate his birthday together. E/S

title: The Void Contract
author: Mikazukino Hikari
synopsis: A slightly less angsty take on the what if: Unable to stop the Void from taking Syaoran's emotions, the two deal with the aftermath of a Contract that should never have been made.

title: A Family Visit
author: Wawa101
synopsis: Fujitaka, Touya and Yukito visit Sakura and Eriol in London for a family holiday. Takes place about a year after "High School Reunion".

title: High School Reunion
author: High School Reunion
synopsis: Sakura and Eriol go to their high school reunion. ExS, featuring Tomoyo, Rika, Naoko, Chiharu & Yamazaki. Set in the same universe as my series. COMPLETE

title: Forever and A Day
author: Wawa101
synopsis: 3rd in the series. Sakura wants to learn more about the magic world by joining the council. After an incident, Sakura learns that her magic has the power to change her life and her future forever.

title: The Past Returns
author: The Past Returns
synopsis: This story takes place straight after movie 2. Syaoran has to go back to Hong Kong, leaving Sakura behind in Japan. Wanting to use her cards without her sealing staff Sakura makes it her new mission in life but is dealing with Syaoran's absence and now a new threat from the past proving to much to handle? Please read to find out! (

title: Our Songs: ExT
author: Our Songs: ExT
synopsis: A collection of stand-alone ficlets inspired by random songs. All ExT.

title: Outside Looking In
author: Outside Looking In
synopsis: Eriol needed inspiration and Tomoyo just happened to move in next door. Two people who have always watched from the sidelines, never part of the world they have always observed. A writer who could read other people like a book and a songbird that had always been trapped in her gilded cage. Will anything happen if you're always on the outside looking in? ExT AU with a side of SxS

title: Will You Marry Me?
author: Will You Marry Me?
synopsis: She finally said yes. Eriol/Sakura. Just a very short piece that I wrote.

title: Everdream
author: anna's-pen
synopsis: "Find me Syaoran. Just once more, for one last time. Find me!". Two star-crossed lovers will try to be by each other's side; every time, every life, until the cycle breaks. SAKXSYAO.

title: Melting a Wolf
author: petite.plants
synopsis: Appearances aren't always what they seem, but hardened Prince Syaoran of the Li Kingdom is quite sure that the angelic young princess in his throne room, though leaving him breathless, is an idiotic girl unworthy of his time. How wrong he would prove himself to be... SakuraxSyaoran

title: Chains of Binding Crystal
author: WixieMoon
synopsis: I'm horrible at summaries so please just read. maybe I'll put a summary later. I don't own Card Captures, I only own my OC's and I'm using the English names. it's K to be safe but honestly nothing bads really in it.

title: Written in Our Stars
author: Written in Our Stars
synopsis: Clow Reed, the most accomplished sorcerer of all times had underestimated the most powerful form of magic, a force named love. This is a story about how this unforeseen power called love completely changes the course of Clow's plans in connection to one of his finest creations, and two humans, one having extraordinary magical powers, and the other possessing no such magic.

title: Cardcaptor Love Heart
author: CryosR
synopsis: (Care Bears Crossover) The Kingdom of Caring has changed drastically to try and relate to the humans. One young Care Bear named Love Heart Bear stumbles across a magic book and accidentally releases the sealed Clow Cards trapped inside. Now with the guidance of the Guardian Beast Keroberos, Love Heart Bear must hunt down and recapture the Clow Cards. But can he keep it a secret?

title: She Is
author: Sakura-chan Master of the Clow
synopsis: Syaoran had to leave Japan right after he confessed his feelings for Sakura. Years later, he's back to study at a University...in Tokyo. Fate would have it Sakura is transferring to the same University and needs a roommate. Follow this couple from sweet childhood friends to lovers who go through everyday life together and rekindle their growing feelings. [album-fic]

title: Lovefool
author: ericaoutloud
synopsis: T. My first CCS fic. Syaoran and others save Sakura from a terrible situation. Just a story that came to me that I needed to get out of my head.

title: Card Captor Megumi
author: Card Captor Megumi
synopsis: 100 years after Sakura's death 12 year-old Megumi Ishida, a quiet, introverted girl stumbles upon and opens the Book of Clow. She'll be drawn into a whirlwind world of magic and danger she never knew existed in order to capture the Sakura Cards. An event that will completely alter her life as she knew it and revive memories that will change her world forever.

title: Sakura: Knight of the Clow
author: Sakura: Knight of the Clow
synopsis: Ace reporter Tomoyo seeks out the mystery defender of Tokyo.. the Knight of Clow!

title: Saudade
author: Saudade
synopsis: Sakura never knew what dark secrets crept through her family and now reuniting with her cousin, she meets destiny ahead of her. Fate seemed to take over and change everything and everyone she knew. Are her dreams a sign of some sort? or memories? (Rewritten)

title: Little Big Surprise
author: Little Big Surprise
synopsis: 6th in the series. Sakura and Eriol are getting ready to embark on a new adventure. Eriol/Sakura.

title: Eriol's Edition of his songbird
author: Empathetic Owl
synopsis: Violet Rose version from Eriol Hiragizawa's perspective with touch of genuine POV and style is mixed - drama dialogue for monologue and mixture of third person, 2nd person and 1st person perspective. Hopefully won't go to hiatus and parental guidance is a must since real world is no fairy tale.

title: An Exercise in Writing
author: Wawa101
synopsis: A collection of unrelated short stories/oneshots.

title: Violet Rose
author: Empathetic Owl
synopsis: Can destiny ever change? Will fate give them another change? Eriol and Tomoyo are traveling through time but how long can they keep it up?

title: A gift of love
author: AnimeSakuraFan
synopsis: Not my first ever CCS fic. Sakura and Syaroan believe their each other's. Belong together. A question begs to be asked. Whom to ask though. Friends/family.

title: Cycled
author: Cavalierious
synopsis: Sakura sits into the late night and ponders her magic. Complete.

title: My Best Friend and I
author: Wawa101
synopsis: Sakura and Eriol are best friends. But their friends are not convinced. Eriol/Sakura, Syaoran/Meiling. Oneshot.

title: the deadly jewels that unlock the emeralds secrets
author: the deadly jewels that unlock the emeralds secrets
synopsis: sakura and the gang are the average teenagers going to school to learn about magic. but what happens when they learn of Sakura, Madison, Chelsea, Rita and Meilins secrets and their very long past. and whats the deal with the jewels they need to find?

title: Somewhere Between Time and Space
author: kakiyoka
synopsis: [MedievalFantasyAU] One fateful day, Sakura, a novice spirit-mage, rescued a near-death boy, who claimed to remember nothing but his name: Li Syaoran. That time, little did she know that his real identity would reveal the world's darkest secrets. Would their encounter ignite an unquenchable tragedy, or would it give birth to a miracle unlike anything the world had ever seen?

title: Making it Count
author: Making it Count
synopsis: ONESHOT. Taking place before the events of Clear Card, Akiho and Kaito have not been travelling together long. But during their time in Paris, Kaito decides to make a delicious chocolate mint cake for her very first birthday since they started on their journey. But when he gives her this present, Akiho's reaction is very unexpected...

title: The Feat of the Sorceress and the Gaijin
author: Pepsipez Ilhuicamina
synopsis: What if you are taken from home, to a place where your lifestyle is no longer there, and in the very beginning of adolescence? In this place, our heroes will learn about themselves, about what unite them, about their lineage and what are capable to do for the sake of each other, in an adventure about heroism, growth and, of course, love.

title: A Chance at Love
author: Wawa101
synopsis: This is a bad idea. He knows it, his guardians know it. But for once in his life, he just wants to follow his heart, not his head. Eriol/Sakura.

title: Strawberry Surprises
author: Strawberry Surprises
synopsis: When fate intervenes to give Tomoyo another chance, will she be able to make the most of it?

title: Honey
author: Captain Imagination
synopsis: This is a light-hearted story. Based on the song from one of the endings of CCS' first season. Enjoy -

title: The return of Li Showron
author: The return of Li Showron
synopsis: AU OOC Old Story new summery Li Left Sakura after dating for a year. 3 years later he has return wanting a 2nd chance that catch is Sakura has moved on. English names ONLY

title: Family Secret
author: David boreanaz's wife247
synopsis: re posted Old Story new summery. this is a tale of Sakura and Yue's daughter Midnight and her un-pleasant in-counter with Li's son Chris she has NO idea what he is on about saying that her mother stole something from his family T for chapter 2 read and you'll understand English names ONLY

title: It's Business
author: It's Business
synopsis: What turned out to be an agreement turns into love. Navigating what it means to live your life looks differently for both Syaoran and Sakura. Business Syaoran is looking for a temporary date to accompany his family functions to avoid an arrangement from his mother. Nurse Sakura wants to enjoy life without sacrificing her freedom. What happens when business becomes too much?

title: A Cut Above
author: A Cut Above
synopsis: Since returning to Japan, Syaoran has yet to get his hair cut, and his vision problems start to get out of hand. He is well overdue for a haircut, however after only having his hair cut by his mother or Wei his entire life, finding someone new to trust with his hair that is not over 2,000 km away is proving to be a struggle...

title: Season's Change
author: vifetoile89
synopsis: OR, a supervillain and a sidekick walk into a Denny's. Tomoyo calls Eriol out on his magical shenanigans. They strike a deal, and unintentionally grow closer, as fall turns into winter. E/T, high school AU, set during the Sakura Card arc. Complete!

title: A Blessing and a Curse
author: A Blessing and a Curse
synopsis: 2nd in the series. Sakura & Eriol go to Hong Kong to help Syaoran and his family, but the situation is more dangerous than they thought. Sakura realizes that being with Eriol is both a blessing and a curse.

title: To Roads and New Beginnings
author: Zoe1105
synopsis: Syaoran and Sakura take much needed vacations in Spain after working hard on the soccer tournament. A companion to Score.

title: Perfect
author: HD is not High Definition
synopsis: Tomoyo prides herself on being perfect. Beauty, wealth, intelligence... but of course, Eriol Hiiragizawa comes in and destroys her perfect foundation. It's on. ExT

title: His Brightest Star
author: Wawa101
synopsis: Sakura thought that after he left, she should move on. She accepted Syaoran's love confession and moved on with her life, or so she thought. But she knew she was lying to herself. Lucky for her, she had an online friend who could understand her. Oneshot. EriolxSakura.

title: Sick Day
author: Wawa101
synopsis: Sakura is sick and Eriol takes care of her. Just a very short oneshot. Established ExS.

title: Sakura and Her Blue Haired Boy
author: Sakura and Her Blue Haired Boy
synopsis: 1st in the series. Sakura and Eriol get closer and their friendship grows. But soon, Sakura realizes that her feelings for him have developed into something more. The question is, can she trust him? And more importantly, can she trust her own feelings? EriolxSakura. COMPLETE

title: The kiss
author: anna's-pen
synopsis: Kissing Sakura Kinomoto had been his mind obsession for some weeks now. Little he knew that she had been wondering how it'd be to lock lips with him. ONESHOT. SXS.

title: Can I Say Goodbye
author: Firalyn Tiatra
synopsis: What if Syaoran never made it back from Hong Kong? Correspondence dies off throughout the years, and Sakura finally feels she has to move on. Based more off of the manga, rated T for possibilities in later chapters.

title: making exceptions
author: pearltiare
synopsis: meiling li did not get sick. it just didn't happen- so how was she gonna explain to her girlfriend that she has a fever at 101 ? well, it seems tomoyo may have psychic abilities, since she's by her side as soon as school is out. meiling certainly wouldn't let anyone take care of her while she was sick, but she figured she could make an exception for tomoyo. lowercase intended

title: loving is easy
author: pearltiare
synopsis: tomoyo daidouji and meiling li had been through a lot together- heartbreak, magic, elementary school, and now junior high school. for meiling, it's easy to look at tomoyo and consider her a dear friend. but what'll happen when meiling realizes that she may feel more for tomoyo ? this fic is fully in lowercase, and there’s space in between punctuation. this is just how i like to wr

title: Cards of Tomorrow
author: DestinySaku
synopsis: 10 years have passed since all the cards have been changed to Sakura Cards and balance has been restored for years in Tomoeda. A lot of things have changed since she grew out of her magical teenage years, including her relationship with Syaoran. However with the sudden return of some familiar faces, she is forced to face many truths about herself and the relationships around her.

title: The many shapes of love
author: anna's-pen
synopsis: Love is a unique kind of magic. Think of it as a living being, once it is alive inside someone's heart it will continue to live as long as it is well taken care of. But since it is alive it wont remain static, it'll change and it'll change you. A collection of oneshots.

title: Mi amor no morirá
author: Sakura H. Kinomoto
synopsis: Three-shot. Ultimo de la serie de Halloween. Aun en la tormenta más obscura, mi amor no morirá.

title: Pride and Prejudice andSakura
author: Pride and Prejudice andSakura
synopsis: Nineteenth century, a time where manners, education, marriage, social prestige and money seemed to be what matters in certain circles of society. In here we meet, two persons living in different ends of the spectrum. A classic take of a Sakura and Syaoran romance.

title: Wake up to Reality
author: Wake up to Reality
synopsis: (*DISCONTINUED*) There are 52 cards in a deck plus the jokers and there are 52 clow cards. What if there were 2 joker clow cards? What if they gave you the power to travel between dimensions? What if a huge cardcaptors fan traveled to Sakura's world? BASED ON ENG. ANIME!

title: What if
author: Millie333
synopsis: What if Sakura and co were attacked the start of episode 58? What if they were backed by a powerful person? What if Eriol had to show himself earlier than anticipated? How will things go from now on? *Not feeling 100%, so hope it turned out okay...

title: It's Always Been You
author: It's Always Been You
synopsis: "I've made the mistake by letting the tigers into my dungeon. Now, only you will be able to protect Sakura and help her claim her rightful place after I die," Kinomoto Fujitaka, the president of Asia's largest department chain stores, explains to Syaoran. With these words, he passes away 3 months later, making Syaoran the new president of Loel and the new guardian of Sakura. SxS

title: Catch You Catch Me- A CardCaptor's Wedding
author: Catch You Catch Me- A CardCaptor's Wedding
synopsis: Sakura is finally getting married to Syaoran. With Tomoyo as her Maid of Honor and Yukito as the Best Man it's all perfect. With just a little help from her friends and dad it will be the perfect day. Both are nervous but are ready to start a new adventure.

title: Archangel
author: TheFicChicks2
synopsis: Mages fight an evil king in a conquered kingdom. When Sakura's dreams are shattared she teams up with a mercenary to bring peace back to the people. But dangerous persuers and secrets suround the two and puts thier mission and thier lives at risk. S&S

title: Syaoran Li eats too much cheddar
author: Syaoran Li eats too much cheddar
synopsis: I had big plans for this story but I got sidetracked. That explains why it is only 250 words.

title: Score
author: Zoe1105
synopsis: Syaoran Li, captain of the Tomoeda High School soccer team and, according to him, soon to be professional soccer player. He had everything. A good and loyal fandom, the perfect girlfriend, and an outstanding future in what he loved the most... soccer. Everything was right till he made a decision that would change his life completely.

title: Florarium
author: Florarium
synopsis: . . . I don't know how, much less when, but you boy with brown hair and dark eyes, you arrived without warning and made yourself master of my kingdom. You turned my erotics orchids into passionate carnations, my complicated gardenias into poppies, and without leaving behind my little columbines for sunflowers. How was it possible to reverse my entire garden? . . .

title: Off the Deep End
author: VivaJayne
synopsis: Li Syaoran has always been good at anything and everything he sets his mind to, so trying out for the school swim team should be easy, right? Sakura x Syaoran. Just a cute scene of Syaoran trying to pretend he doesn't have a crush. (Written in collaboration with friends)

title: TORN
author: millayui
synopsis: It was summer the first time I met her, she's like an angel came down from heaven, the way she smiled and laughed it's like eternity to my heart, I asked myself why I felt this way? anyway I shrugged it off, I'm too old for that.

title: The Masked Vampire
author: animechick132
synopsis: "W-will it hurt?" she stuttered, lying on her back, staring up into the mesmerizing amber eyes. "Of course not...It will be more pleasurable than anything else," he whispered against her neck. Sakura was just an innocent girl with morals, looking for her missing family, so how did she find herself wrapped up in a world full of vampires who wanted to take over the world?

title: Worth the Wait
author: nausicaa304
synopsis: Sakura, Syaoran, Tomoyo, Rika, Chiharu, Yamazaki, and Naoko have finally graduated from high school. What will the future bring for the romance that has been held in secret since grade school? Will the couple still have a place in their hearts for each other after all this time?

title: The possesion
author: Millie333
synopsis: A few months after the void card incident, Sakura and co decided to meet up to celebrate Christmas together. But, then... *It's my first CCS fanfic, check out my reviews(I write them instead of the author note etc) and comment on them.

title: Cardcaptor Sakura and The Blue Blur
author: Cardcaptor Sakura and The Blue Blur
synopsis: Set after The Sealed Cards. Sakura Kinomoto a mistress of the Clow card live in normal life after she changed the Void to the Hope Card. She found a golden ring in her room which it bring back some lost memories to her. The mysterious robot appear Tomoeda, searching for the gems called the Chaos Emeralds which are more powerful than Sakura, Syaoran and everything else. Base on SMBZ

title: A Study In Clow
author: A Study In Clow
synopsis: "Everything is inevitable" is much different than "Everything will be alright." A world that believes in the inevitable leaves little room for growth. Fate and power take precedent over much in life, but one day, faith in one another might just mean something. Something so much more than the inevitable. Eriol and Tomoyo slow dance in a world that blooms as it burns.

title: Closer
author: LiLover131
synopsis: ONESHOT. While Syaoran is away in Hong Kong taking care of the things he needs to do, Sakura struggles to deal with the pain of their separation, and only his letters are able to quell the anguish. Will the letters be enough to help her hold on? Or will they find themselves drifting even farther apart? Takes place before the Clear Card arc.

title: Sakura's Wedding
author: Sakura's Wedding
synopsis: I don't own the characters.

title: Nothing
author: Ellie Etendue
synopsis: Sakura transforms The Nothing. Syaoran has to live with the consequences.

title: The Spell
author: HD is not High Definition
synopsis: "I love you, Hiiragizawa-kun," Tomoyo said tearfully. Eriol stared, and soon, he began to realize just what happened to the spell he had been attempting to make. Love spells, ex-girlfriends, heartbreak, a confused Sakura and an overprotective Syaoran. ExT SxS

title: In The Shadows
author: maxwell.yuri
synopsis: She had finally agreed to be with him. But only in the shadows. ExT One-shot.

title: All Right In Time
author: maxwell.yuri
synopsis: In the end, what matters is that they try to make it right.

title: This Time (we'll do it right)
author: K.R. Saks
synopsis: The Void had taken Syaoran's memories of Sakura. Ten years later, they meet again. He doesn't remember her, but she makes his heart flutter, makes his speech stutter, and makes him wonder whether she's the missing piece in his life. This is the story of their rekindled love, told in three parts.

title: Favorite Girl
author: okabe-angel
synopsis: "You really have a gift. I'm your number 1 fan!" Before leaving town, she said those words to him: a poor guy singing in an alley. Now he is a famous singer/song-writer whose breakthrough album had sold 100,000 copies in its first week in Japan, wishing that she'd see him again: a global superstar who has fallen in love with her...

title: They Will Never Know
author: maxwell.yuri
synopsis: A glimpse into something they think is out of reach. ExT Vignette.

title: A New Beginning
author: MadamKabooshkwa
synopsis: Sakura anxiously waits for the person she loves most to return home from work, for she has some exciting news to share with him.

title: Fated to Love You
author: Fated to Love You
synopsis: Sakura Kinomoto, an introvert and shy person who always gets bullied at school. She dreams of having a fair normal life like everybody would have. Syaoran Li, the school's number one heartthrob and the guy for every lady's dreams. He has everything from wealth to looks and he couldn't ask for more. One day, their paths crossed and they are shoved into each others' lives.

title: The Way Back To You
author: The Way Back To You
synopsis: Finally returning to Hong Kong after his mission, Li Syaoran must face the consequences of his failed mission and fight for his own happiness. Starts right after the TV series ended. My first fic. Please enjoy and leave a comment! Any criticisms or suggestions to improve are greatly appreciated. Cardcaptor Sakura and it's characters are property of CLAMP.

title: a helping hand or two
author: amukWrites
synopsis: Syaoran was certain that nothing was as terrifying as Tomoyo's smile. It didn't matter how cute Sakura looked in her outfits, that smile only promised trouble.

title: Terrified
author: maxwell.yuri
synopsis: Eriol moves back to Japan and becomes friends with Tomoyo. He was willing to be all she needed, if only she will let him try.

title: Now We Are Free
author: Captain Imagination
synopsis: Sakura Kinomoto witness' the death of Syaoran Li, and, with the help of her best friend Second Cousin - Tomoyo Daidouji learns to love again.

title: Dark Grace: Adam's Apple
author: A Star Rewriter
synopsis: Grace hopped on a plane and flew to where her sister and Eriol were at. Calling in some extra help, Grace and her two oldest friends must find Sora and Eriol before Prince Adam does something terrible to them.

title: Master's Secret
author: maxwell.yuri
synopsis: Nakuru sees more than she lets on. One-shot.

title: Ancient History: The Cursed House
author: Ancient History: The Cursed House
synopsis: Hope Pevense is a history fanatic. She longs to build a museum to honor Clow Reed and many others like him. But to do that, she must dig deep into the past of ancient magics. What adventure will she have along the way? Read to find out.

title: The Yearn
author: maxwell.yuri
synopsis: Sakura plans an intervention for her stubborn friends using one of her new cards. But will everything work according to plan? ExT

title: These Foolish Things
author: maxwell.yuri
synopsis: Eriol had to move back to England and Tomoyo finds it much harder to let go this time as she remembers memories spent with him.
